backup.section: Backup and restore your heating plans
backup.label: Heating plan configuration

clone.title: Duplicate heating plan
clone.text: Enter a new name and presss OK to create a copy of the heating plan '__name__'.

copy.title: Copy schedule
copy.text: Select the days, you want the current schedule also be applied to.

overrides.title: Edit schedule exceptions
overrides.text: Pause the configured schedule when something special happens, e.g. you leave home unplanned, or you return earlier. To activate the special behavior, you have to set the scheduler to the appropriate mode using the plans overview page.
overrides.away: ...when you are a day away from home?

confirm.title: Do you really want to remove the heating plan?
confirm.content: Press OK to permanently remove the heating plan. This action cannot be undone.

overview.text: Give your plan a speaking name.
overview.text_enable: If you disable the plan, it is not applied automatically, but can still apply it manually via Flow.
overview.text_schedule: Configure the schedules when your heating devices' temperature need to be adjusted. Additional exceptions can be configured e.g. when something special happens: You leave home unplanned, or you return earlier.

zones.text: Check the zones to which you want this plan to be applied to. All devices that support setting a target temperature inside such zones are included.

devices.text: Check the devices you want this plan to be applied to. You can mix zones and individual devices, no problem.
